name: part_003
file: tmp_[#SakuraMiko New 3D Unveiling] Check out the super-elite Miko! [HoloLive⧸SakuraMiko] [T7AkrTQwSjs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Miko and Pekora taking photos of various poses.
Miko tries a cool, gunman-like pose.
Miko lies down on the tatami mat.
Miko does a pose imitating Pekora's laugh.
Pekora forces Miko to do a dogeza pose for a screenshot.
Miko does 'Good morning' and 'Good night' poses.
Miko performs her 'Super Elite' shrine maiden pose.
Pekora asks for a kiss face, then attacks Miko with a giant carrot.

subtitles.original: おお、ウインクいいぺこじゃん！
subtitles.english: Oh, that wink is good, Pekora!

subtitles.original: ほめてほめて！
subtitles.english: Praise me, praise me!

subtitles.original: セクシー顔できねーぺこかな？
subtitles.english: Can't you do a sexy face, Pekora?

subtitles.original: セクシー路線は？
subtitles.english: How about the sexy route?

subtitles.original: 色んな角度で撮る…
subtitles.english: Taking from various angles...

subtitles.original: あ、いいぺこじゃん。
subtitles.english: Oh, that's good, Pekora.

subtitles.original: あ、その顔めっちゃいいぺこじゃん！
subtitles.english: Oh, that face is really good, Pekora!

subtitles.original: エリートです。
subtitles.english: I'm elite.

subtitles.original: あ、いいね！
subtitles.english: Oh, nice!

subtitles.original: どやぁ。
subtitles.english: Doya!

subtitles.original: あ、可愛い、可愛いぺこじゃん。
subtitles.english: Oh, cute, you're cute, Pekora.

subtitles.original: え、嘘？これカッコよく決まってる？
subtitles.english: Wait, really? Is this cool? Is it working?

subtitles.original: 決まってる！なんか銃ぶっぱなしてそう。
subtitles.english: It's working! Looks like you're firing a gun.

subtitles.original: うわっ、バババババ！
subtitles.english: Whoa, ba-ba-ba-ba-ba!

subtitles.original: 仰向けして！仰向け！
subtitles.english: Face up! Face up!

subtitles.original: 仰向けってなんだっけ？
subtitles.english: What was "face up" again?

subtitles.original: 天井だっけ？
subtitles.english: Was it the ceiling?

subtitles.original: そうそう、天井向いてぺこ。
subtitles.english: Yeah, look at the ceiling, Pekora.

subtitles.original: あ、でも疲れたから…
subtitles.english: Ah, but I'm tired, so...

subtitles.original: ちょっと一回休もうっと。
subtitles.english: I'll rest for a bit.

subtitles.original: あ、そっちでやる？そっちでやる？
subtitles.english: Oh, doing it there? Doing it there?

subtitles.original: ちょっと、はい、仰向けしてくれぺこじゃん。
subtitles.english: Wait, come on, face up for me, Pekora.

subtitles.original: なんで？
subtitles.english: Why?

subtitles.original: 怖いよ！落とさないから大丈夫ぺこじゃん。
subtitles.english: It's scary! I won't drop you, so it's okay, Pekora.

subtitles.original: あ、ヤバい、またパンツ見せてる…
subtitles.english: Oh no, you're showing your pants again...

subtitles.original: あー！やめなさいよ！
subtitles.english: Ah! Stop it!

subtitles.original: またパンツ見せてくんじゃないのあんた。
subtitles.english: Stop showing your pants all the time.

subtitles.original: 見せないぺこ！
subtitles.english: I'm not showing them, Pekora!

subtitles.original: おぉー。
subtitles.english: Ooh.

subtitles.original: 飛行機…
subtitles.english: A plane...

subtitles.original: あ、いいね、なんか…
subtitles.english: Oh, that's good, like...

subtitles.original: なんかちょっとそそられる…あ、寝てんのあんた？
subtitles.english: I'm getting a bit excited... Oh, are you sleeping?

subtitles.original: 寝てない！配信中ぺこ！
subtitles.english: I'm not sleeping! This is a stream, Pekora!

subtitles.original: 配信中！起きな！
subtitles.english: Mid-stream! Wake up!

subtitles.original: いや、楽しいな、久しぶりに。
subtitles.english: Man, this is fun, it's been a while.

subtitles.original: みこ先輩の動き見た気がするぺこじゃんね。
subtitles.english: I feel like I've seen Miko-senpai's movements, Pekora.

subtitles.original: いいね、なんかポーズぺこ。
subtitles.english: Nice, how about a pose, Pekora?

subtitles.original: 変わった？そんなに。
subtitles.english: Has it changed? That much?

subtitles.original: 変わった…でも変わったよね。
subtitles.english: It's changed... yeah, it has.

subtitles.original: あ、なんか兎田のポーズあるよ、それ。
subtitles.english: Oh, I have Usada's pose! Here!

subtitles.original: ねえ馬鹿にしてんの、あんた？
subtitles.english: Hey, are you making fun of me?

subtitles.original: あんた、馬鹿にしてんの？
subtitles.english: You, are you making fun of me?

subtitles.original: やってないよ、やってないぺこでしょ！
subtitles.english: I'm not! I don't do that, Pekora!

subtitles.original: こんなやつ…ねえ、あんた馬鹿にしすぎじゃないの？
subtitles.english: Like this... Hey, aren't you making fun of me too much?

subtitles.original: ぺこがいつも作った、ねぇ、MMDのあの写真…
subtitles.english: The MMD photos that Pekora always makes...

subtitles.original: あ、撮ってんだ。あの土下座のやつ。
subtitles.english: Oh, taking photos. The dogeza one.

subtitles.original: みこ先輩のさ、ぺこらの作ったMMDで一番好きなの土下座ぺこなんだけど。
subtitles.english: My favorite MMD of Miko-senpai is the dogeza one, Pekora.

subtitles.original: あれめっちゃ可愛いでしょ？
subtitles.english: That's super cute, right?

subtitles.original: また土下座させてあげるぺこ。
subtitles.english: I'll let you do the dogeza again, Pekora.

subtitles.original: あ、めっちゃ…ちょっとお願いします、せーの！
subtitles.english: Oh, please... ready, go!

subtitles.original: え、なんか嫌なんだけど。
subtitles.english: Wait, I don't really want to.
Hurry up! 5, 4...

subtitles.original: なんでよ、みこ何も悪いことしてないのに！
subtitles.english: Why? Miko didn't do anything wrong!

subtitles.original: ３、２、１、すみません！
subtitles.english: 3, 2, 1, I'm sorry!

subtitles.original: あ、嫌なんだけど。スクショ、スクショ！今の大事ぺこじゃんね。
subtitles.english: I hate this. Screenshot, screenshot! This is a masterpiece, Pekora.

subtitles.original: 謝罪するときとか、大事なときに…
subtitles.english: For when you're apologizing, or for important times...

subtitles.original: 何もしてないのに、巫女さんなのに！
subtitles.english: Even though I haven't done anything, even though I'm a shrine maiden!

subtitles.original: 絶対に使っていいぺこだからね。
subtitles.english: Feel free to use this, okay, Pekora.

subtitles.original: ひどい、ひどい！
subtitles.english: Mean! Mean!

subtitles.original: 土下座させられた。
subtitles.english: I was made to do a dogeza.

subtitles.original: あ、でもみんな可愛いって言ってくれてるぺこ。
subtitles.english: Oh, but everyone is saying you're cute, Pekora.

subtitles.original: 嘘ですよ、草って言ってるぞ！
subtitles.english: Lies! They're saying "lol"!

subtitles.original: ちょっと見ろよお前、笑いものにされてる今日。
subtitles.english: Look at you, you're being made a laughingstock today.

subtitles.original: エリートなアイドルの姿見せようとしたのに！
subtitles.english: I was trying to show you my elite idol form!

subtitles.original: たくさんね、使ってくださいぺこな。なんかそういうのいい、なんか使えそうな動き…
subtitles.english: Use it a lot, Pekora! Any other usable movements or poses?

subtitles.original: ポーズねーの？使えそうなやつ。
subtitles.english: Any poses? Usable ones.

subtitles.original: 使えそうなやつ？さっきごめんなさいやったじゃん、ごめんなさいやったじゃん。
subtitles.english: Usable ones? I did the "I'm sorry" one earlier, twice.

subtitles.original: 「おはよう」、せーの！
subtitles.english: "Good morning," ready, go!

subtitles.original: おはよ！
subtitles.english: Morning!

subtitles.original: ねえ、やめて！やめて！
subtitles.english: Hey, stop it! Stop it!

subtitles.original: 明日からさ、３５Ｐたちがさ、みこ先輩がさ…
subtitles.english: From tomorrow, the 35P will say, "Miko-senpai..."

subtitles.original: おはよう、ったらそれが来るぺこよ。
subtitles.english: ...good morning," and then this will come, Pekora.

subtitles.original: おはよ！おはよ！おはよ！
subtitles.english: Morning! Morning! Morning!

subtitles.original: 「おやすみ」は？せーの！
subtitles.english: How about "Good night"? Ready, go!

subtitles.original: おやすみ。
subtitles.english: Good night.

subtitles.original: にゃー可愛い、あ、それめっちゃいいぺこじゃんね。
subtitles.english: Nyaa, cute! Ah, that's really good, Pekora.

subtitles.original: これ欲しいね、撮っちゃお。撮っちゃお。
subtitles.english: I want this one, taking it. Taking it.

subtitles.original: あ、いいじゃん、たくさん撮れそうじゃん。
subtitles.english: Oh, nice, looks like we can take a lot.

subtitles.original: あと何だろう。なんかある？ここポイントポーズ。
subtitles.english: What else? Anything? A highlight pose.

subtitles.original: 回せ回せ、せーの！
subtitles.english: Spin, spin, ready, go!

subtitles.original: あ、はい！はい！
subtitles.english: Ah, yes! Yes!

subtitles.original: 芳香マリンでーす！…なんだっけ？
subtitles.english: I'm Houshou Marine! ...Wait, what was it?

subtitles.original: 芳香マリンでーす！…古すぎぺこでしょ！
subtitles.english: I'm Houshou Marine! ...That's too old-fashioned, Pekora!

subtitles.original: え、みこ先輩のそれないの？
subtitles.english: Wait, don't you have your own, Miko-senpai?

subtitles.original: え、みこの？あるよ。
subtitles.english: Eh, mine? I have one.

subtitles.original: ピンボー神社のさくらみこです！
subtitles.english: I'm Sakura Miko of the Pinbo Shrine!

subtitles.original: ピンボーってやだ！
subtitles.english: Pinbo sounds bad!

subtitles.original: 繁栄のためにやってるの！
subtitles.english: I'm doing it for prosperity!

subtitles.original: はい、エリートさくら神社のスーパーエリートみこ！
subtitles.english: Yes, the super elite Miko of the Elite Sakura Shrine!

subtitles.original: さくらー！みこー！ドドン！
subtitles.english: Sakura! Miko! Dadan!

subtitles.original: ちょっとダサい、ドドンってダサいぺこじゃん！
subtitles.english: Wait, that's lame! Dadan is too lame, Pekora!

subtitles.original: あまりにもなんか急だからじゃ！
subtitles.english: It's because I'm in such a hurry!

subtitles.original: あ、そういうことね。じゃあ今度考えといてぺこで。
subtitles.english: Oh, I see. Then think of a better one next time, Pekora.

subtitles.original: 今度ね、今度やるときに。
subtitles.english: Next time, when I do it next time.

subtitles.original: いいね、なんかめちゃくちゃ可愛くなったぺこどの。
subtitles.english: Nice, you've become really cute, Miko-dono.

subtitles.original: 本当？
subtitles.english: Really?

subtitles.original: うん、なんかも馬鹿にできないねみこのこと。よりポンコツになった？
subtitles.english: Yeah, I can't even make fun of you anymore. Did you become more of a ponkotsu?

subtitles.original: あ、惚れちゃった？
subtitles.english: Oh, did you fall for me?

subtitles.original: いや惚れてない、惚れてない。なんかあんた耳遠くなってない？よりポンコツに…
subtitles.english: No, I haven't. Are your ears getting farther away? More ponkotsu...

subtitles.original: 今惚れたって言ったじゃん！
subtitles.english: You just said you fell for me!

subtitles.original: よりポンコツになった感じがすごいするぺこ。でも可愛い、めちゃめちゃ。
subtitles.english: I really feel like you've become more of a ponkotsu. But you're super cute.

subtitles.original: みんなも惚れてるんじゃねーぺこな、みんなのコメントなんて？
subtitles.english: Everyone is falling for you too, right? What are the comments saying?

subtitles.original: 「キャーい！キャーい！」って言ってる。
subtitles.english: They're saying "Kyo-i! Kyo-i!"

subtitles.original: あ、キラキラしてるぺこだったよ。あ、ガチ恋してるってさ。
subtitles.english: Oh, they said you're sparkling. And they're falling in love for real.

subtitles.original: 待て、ちょっとキラキラが移っちゃうからってやつ。
subtitles.english: Wait, it's just that the sparkling is rubbing off on them.

subtitles.original: お、キス顔してキス顔。
subtitles.english: Oh, show us a kiss face, a kiss face.

subtitles.original: やだよ、ないよそんなの！
subtitles.english: No way, I don't have one!

subtitles.original: あるぺこでしょ！チュして。チュ。
subtitles.english: You do, don't you? Give us a "chu." A "chu."

subtitles.original: ない、ない！本当にない！
subtitles.english: No, I don't! I really don't!

subtitles.original: ちょっとしなよ。チュってやればいいぺこ。
subtitles.english: Just do it. It's fine to just do a "chu."

subtitles.original: おえっ！
subtitles.english: Ugh!
